info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-l2vpn-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for L2VPN services operational data.
     Copyright (c) 2022 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** VPN & Tunnels
**Paths:** 6
